thread.section_title: BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services | beliteweight.com
thread.title: Annette J.
thread.title_full: BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services reviewed by Annette J.

author: Annette J.
title: Annette J.
text: BeLiteWeight guided me through a difficult situation with ease. Jessica was my "person" from start to finish. I had her cell phone number and she answered anytime I called and answered my questions with ease. The thought of going to Mexico for weightloss surgery was terrifying at first but BeLiteWeight was so great in putting my fears to rest. The doctors they recommended couldn't have been better and I felt secure and safe the entire time. I received followup calls from Jessica for several months after my surgery to ensure that I was doing well. Surgery was a great success and I am still down 100 lbs. I wouldn't have changed a thing about my experience with them.
